brand_identity.name: STEPBAU
brand_identity.tagline: Präzision am Bau. Ihr Partner für Trockenbau & Innenausbau.
brand_identity.tone: Professional, Solid, German Precision, Modern, Efficient

headings.usage: Use Black (900) for Hero headlines, Bold (700) for Section titles. Tracking tight (-0.02em).

body.usage: Light (300) for large intro text, Regular (400) for standard reading. Relaxed line-height.

technical.usage: Use for small labels, stats, or 'form' elements to give a technical blueprint feel.

primary.description: Stepbau Teal - Used for primary buttons, active states, and key highlights.

secondary.description: Neon Teal - Used for borders, glowing effects, and 'contour' lines.

layout_strategies.spacing: Generous. Section padding: py-24 or py-32. Element gaps: gap-8 to gap-16.
layout_strategies.grid_system: Bento Grid (Mode A). Mix of col-span-4, col-span-8, and col-span-full.
layout_strategies.border_style: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.1). Active borders: 1px solid #2dd4bf with drop-shadow.

buttons.primary: bg-[#00b4d8] text-white hover:bg-[#0096c7] rounded-none uppercase tracking-widest font-bold px-8 py-4 transition-all hover:shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(0,180,216,0.4)]
buttons.outline: bg-transparent border border-[#00b4d8] text-[#00b4d8] hover:bg-[#00b4d8] hover:text-white rounded-none uppercase tracking-widest font-bold px-8 py-4

cards.service_card: bg-[#111111] border border-white/10 p-8 hover:border-[#2dd4bf] hover:shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(45,212,191,0.2)] transition-all duration-300 group relative overflow-hidden

inputs.style: bg-[#1a1a1a] border border-white/10 focus:border-[#00b4d8] text-white p-4 rounded-none focus:ring-1 focus:ring-[#00b4d8] transition-colors

visual_enhancers.neon_contour: Use specific 'border-glow' utility: border border-teal-400/30 shadow-[0_0_10px_rgba(45,212,191,0.1)]
visual_enhancers.textures: Use subtle noise overlay on the #0a0a0a background to prevent banding and add 'concrete' feel.
visual_enhancers.scroll_animations: Elements should fade-up (opacity 0 -> 1, y 20 -> 0) as they enter viewport.
visual_enhancers.tracing_beam: On Service Cards, implement a hover effect where a gradient border traces the edge.

hero_background.usage: Hero section background with heavy dark overlay (bg-black/70)

drywall_detail.usage: Service card background or 'About Us' side image

sections_structure.header: Fixed, blurred glass (backdrop-blur-md bg-black/50). Logo left, Nav right (hidden mobile), Hamburger mobile.
sections_structure.hero: Full height (min-h-screen). Centralized bold text 'MEISTERHAFTE PRÄZISION'. Two Buttons: 'JETZT ANRUFEN' (Primary), 'ANGEBOT ANFRAGEN' (Outline).
sections_structure.services: Grid layout. 6 Cards: Trockenbau, Innenausbau, Bodenverlegung, Brandschutz, Akustikbau, Malerarbeiten. Each card has an icon and hover reveal text.
sections_structure.map: Full width dark map (custom style). Overlay card for Contact Info.
sections_structure.contact: Simple form: Name, Firm, Email, Phone, Message. Checkbox for Datenschutz.
sections_structure.footer: Simple 4-col. Address, Links (Impressum, Datenschutz), Socials. Copyright.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. SETUP: Install 'lucide-react' for icons. Use 'framer-motion' for scroll animations.
2. THEME: Force DARK MODE class on the html element. Do not implement light mode toggle unless explicitly asked (Guidelines say Dark Theme preferred).
3. FONT: Import Montserrat and Poppins from Google Fonts in index.css.
4. NEON: Create a custom utility class '.neon-border' that applies the teal shadow.
5. MAP: Use a placeholder static image or iframe for Google Maps with a grayscale filter (`filter: grayscale(100%) invert(90%)`) to match the dark theme.
6. FORM: Ensure the contact form has the 'Datenschutz' checkbox required by German law (DSGVO).
7. LANGUAGE: Add a small text toggle 'DE | EN' in the navbar. Default to DE.
8. ANTI-AI: Do not center the Hero text perfectly. Offset it slightly or use a heavy left align with a massive font size (text-6xl md:text-8xl).
universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) for the Navbar and Contact Overlay.
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters.
